title: Provincial Component of Northern Road Connectivity Project Funded by Asian Development Bank. Awarding of Supervision Consultancy Contract for Supervision of Civil Works Contracts in Northern Province
decision_details: - the Asian Development Bank has allocated a sum of US $173 million for rehabilitation and upgrading of National and Provincial roads in the Northern Province.  The total value of the contract is US $2,514,365.49 with a foreign currency component of US $766,158,00 and and a local currency component Rs.197,495,000.00.
